results.title: Introduction to Supabase - an Open Source Firebase Alternative
results.description: Episode Introduction to Supabase - an Open Source Firebase Alternative with Aaron Wislang, Yuri Santana, Thor Schaeff Open at Microsoft The Supabase community is building all the capabilities of Firebase but using PostgreSQL as the core database. Chapters 00:00 - Introduction 00:30 - What is Supabase 01:48 - Supabase demo 07:47 - How to talk to.

descriptions.content: Episode Introduction to Supabase - an Open Source Firebase Alternative with Aaron Wislang, Yuri Santana, Thor Schaeff Open at Microsoft The Supabase community is building all the capabilities of Firebase but using PostgreSQL as the core database. results.title: Deploy Docker Compose for agents to Azure Container Apps Preview
results.description: Deploy Docker Compose for agents to Azure Container Apps Preview This article shows you how to deploy applications to Azure Container Apps by using Docker’s Compose for Agents. Docker for Agents on Azure Container Apps currently supports the following Stdio MCP servers: AppSignal, BigQuery, Confluence, DuckDuckGo, Fetch, Filesystem, Git, Google.

results.title: Everything you need to know about Postgres Row Level Security
results.description: Episode Everything you need to know about Postgres Row Level Security with Paul Copplestone POSETTE: An Event for Postgres 2024 Video of a conference talk ab... Paul is the CEO and co-founder of Supabase. Supabase is the Postgres developer platform that manages over a million Postgres databases. The are an open source company, contributing back to.
